# PHP-Exception

A helper package used by other Secure Trading packages.

Provides an exception class that extends `\Exception`.

## Release History

| Version  | Changes                        |
| -------- |---------------                 |
| 1.0.1    | Added composer.lock            |
| 1.0.0    | Initial Release                |

## PHP Version Compatibility

| Version  | Changes                        |
| -------- |---------------                 |
| 1.0.1    | PHP 5.3+                       |
| 1.0.0    | PHP 5.3+                       |
